content: looking for some spf that doesn t require a bathtub scrub after wearing the cleo kids fedora will shade all the little freckled faces without a single sunscreen argument to be had this is the pint-sized version of the popular cleo fedora sun hat adult pattern just like the larger counterpart tight stitches ensure this packable sun hat is moldable comfortable and surprisingly lightweight skills required include single_crochet and working in the round this ad-free pdf includes written instructions a photo tutorial and a link to a video tutorial for adding an optional wire to stabilize the brim the photos are separate from the written pattern so you can choose to print them or conserve ink the combination of style and function might just make this your go-to crochet project for the warmer months this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew see separate listing for adult sized pattern skill level - advanced beginner sizing baby - fits 14-16 heads toddler - fits 16-18 heads child - fits 10-20 heads tween - fits 20-22 heads downloading - this listing is for the cleo kids fedora crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns check out more of our free crochet patterns for summer here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/category/holiday-projects/summer/
